generated.css: @import url(https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Lato);body,html{font-family:Nunito;height:100%;width:99%;margin:0;padding:0}.share_url{height:10%;width:80%;font-family:Nunito;color:#8a8c89;font-weight:700;font-size:30px;text-align:center;position:relative;top:-700px}h2{font-size:18px;padding:10px 20px;color:#fff;background:#c21fa2}#container{max-width:600px;margin:auto;box-shadow:1px 3px 5px rgba(0,0,0,.5);border-radius:2px;position:relative;top:30px}#chat-window{height:400px;overflow:auto;background:#e6e6e6}#ulist{padding:0;list-style-type:none}#ulist li{height:auto;margin-bottom:12px;clear:both;padding-left:12px;padding-right:12px}#ulist li span{display:inline-block;max-width:300px;min-width:40px;background-color:#fff;padding:5px;border-radius:4px;position:relative;border:1px solid #8a8c89}#ulist li span.left{float:left;background-color:#fff}#ulist li span.left:after{left:-8.5px;border-right:10px solid #fff}#ulist li span.left:after,#ulist li span.left:before{content:"";display:inline-block;position:absolute;top:7px;height:0;width:0;border-top:8px solid transparent;border-bottom:8px solid transparent}#ulist li span.left:before{left:-9px;border-right:8px solid #000}#ulist li span.right:after{right:-8px;border-left:8px solid #dbedfe}#ulist li span.right:after,#ulist li span.right:before{content:"";display:inline-block;position:absolute;top:6px;height:0;width:0;border-top:8px solid transparent;border-bottom:8px solid transparent}#ulist li span.right:before{right:-9px;border-left:8px solid #000}#ulist li span.right{float:right;background-color:#dbedfe}.clear{clear:both}#message,label{box-sizing:border-box;display:block;padding:10px 20px}#message{background:#eee;border:0;width:100%;background:#fff;border-bottom:1px solid #eee;font-family:Nunito;font-size:16px}#message:focus{border:1px solid #ffcaf5;outline:none}input[type=file]{display:none}.custom-file-upload{border:1px solid #ccc;display:inline-block;padding:6px 12px;position:relative;top:-36px;left:255px}.custom-file-upload,button{cursor:pointer;background:#c21fa2;color:#fff}button{font-size:18px;border:0;padding:12px 0;width:100%;border-radius:0 0 2px 2px}button:hover{background:linear-gradient(90deg,#c21fa2,#9d4dc3)}.message-box{position:relative;top:-550px;height:10%;width:50%;margin:auto;color:#c21fa2;font-size:170%;text-align:center}.quotes{display:none}.gif{position:relative;top:-900px;right:-1280px;width:40px}.night{background:#080d17}.time-circle{position:relative;background:linear-gradient(180deg,#be4405,#f6c60c);width:200px;height:200px;border-radius:50%;border:3.5px solid #999;overflow:hidden;padding:0;margin:0 auto;margin-bottom:5px;box-shadow:0 0 20px rgba(0,0,0,.4);top:-540px;left:-610px;transition:all 1.1s ease-in-out}.night .time-circle{background:linear-gradient(180deg,#111936,#285a7b);border-color:#e9e5d5}.sun{margin-top:10px;background:#f2ef88;box-shadow:0 0 20px hsla(58,80%,74%,.4);width:15%;height:15%;border-radius:50%;position:relative;left:15%;top:28%;animation:pulse 5s ease infinite alternate;transition:all 1.1s ease .4s}@keyframes pulse{0%{box-shadow:0 0 20px hsla(58,80%,74%,.4)}50%{box-shadow:0 0 40px #f2ef88}to{box-shadow:0 0 20px hsla(58,80%,74%,.4)}}.night .sun{top:2%;left:-10%}.moon,.night .sun{transition:all 1.1s ease 0s}.moon{position:absolute;margin-top:10px;background:#d9d8d0;box-shadow:inset -10px 2px 0 0 #899098;width:22.5%;height:22.5%;border-radius:100%;position:relative;left:120%;margin-left:-50px;top:-50%;overflow:hidden}.night .moon{left:65%;top:-10%;transition:all 1.1s ease .4s}.moon div:nth-child(n){position:relative;background:#b9b8b0;border-radius:50%;box-shadow:inset 4px -2px 0 0 #535457}.moon div:first-child{top:25%;left:12%;width:27%;height:27%}.moon div:nth-child(2){top:-11%;left:60%;width:16%;height:16%}.moon div:nth-child(3){top:25%;left:44%;width:16%;height:16%}.stars{opacity:0;margin-left:100px;top:0;left:0;transition:all .8s ease 0s;z-index:1000}.night .stars{opacity:1;transition:all 3s ease .4s}.stars div:nth-child(n){position:absolute;background:radial-gradient(#fff,hsla(0,0%,100%,0));border-radius:50%;box-shadow:0 0 10px #fff;overflow:hidden;width:.4%;height:.4%;margin-left:20%;margin-top:-20%;transition:all 1s ease 0s}.night .stars div:nth-child(n){margin-left:0;margin-top:0;transition:all 1s ease-out .4s}.stars div:first-child{left:25%;top:30%}.stars div:nth-child(2){left:55%;top:20%}.stars div:nth-child(3){left:60%;top:60%}.stars div:nth-child(4){left:40%;top:45%}.stars div:nth-child(5){left:15%;top:55%}.stars div:nth-child(6){left:40%;top:10%}.stars div:nth-child(7){left:80%;top:55%}.water{position:absolute;background:repeating-radial-gradient(ellipse farthest-corner at center -400%,#f5c30e 30%,#518eac 90%) repeat scroll 0 0 #518eac;width:100%;height:200px;top:68%;transition:all 1.1s ease}.night .water{background:repeating-radial-gradient(ellipse farthest-corner at center -400%,#7fa1bb 30%,#1d425a 90%) repeat scroll 0 0 #1d425a}#circle,#switch{height:30px;transition:all .4s cubic-bezier(.54,1.6,.5,1)}#switch{width:60px;margin:0 auto;border:2px solid #da8508;border-radius:27px;background:#da8508;position:relative;top:-540px;left:-610px}#circle{margin-top:5%;margin-left:5%;width:40%;height:80%;border-radius:50%;box-shadow:0 4px 4px rgba(26,53,71,.25),0 0 0 1px rgba(26,53,71,.07);background:#e9e5d5}.switched{border-color:#1c3958!important;background:#1c3958!important}.switched #circle{margin-left:55%;background:#e9e5d5}
